definitions.definition: A person who talks excessively about themselves.
A person who believes in their own importance or superiority.

labels: by confusion of the similar words
definitions.label_groups: nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words

main_definition: A person who talks excessively about themselves.
secondary_definitions: A person who believes in their own importance or superiority.
( nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words ) An egoist ( advocate of egoism ) .
